page.description: Gets the data for a TransForm form.

prototypes.prototype: C JSONData = a5TransForm_GetData(C apikey, C formid [,L paginated [,N pageSize [,N pageNumber [,P Obj [,L flagDisplayWaitMessage]]]]])

argument.name: apikey
argument.description: Your TransFrom API key. You can get an API key from the Developer Options section located on the Home tab in *[extlink:TransForm Central@https://transform.alphasoftware.com]*.

argument.name: formid
argument.description: This is the ID of the TransForm form definition for which you want to get data.

argument.name: paginated
argument.description: .t./.f. - defaults to .f. - Specifies if all of the forms should be returned at once, or just a single "page" of data

argument.name: pageSize
argument.description: The number of records in a page of data. Defaults to 10. Only used if paginated is .t.

argument.name: pageNumber
argument.description: The page number of data to return. Defaults to 1. Only used if paginated is .t.

argument.name: Obj
argument.description: An object (Xbasic dot variable) that will be filled in with information when the function executes. The object will contain these properties:

property.name: error
property.description: A .t. or .f. value. If .t., an error occurred. Otherwise, *[xb:Obj.error]* will be false.

property.name: errorText
property.description: A description of the error if there was an error

property.name: recordCount
property.description: The number of form instances that were found.

argument.name: flagDisplayWaitMessage
argument.description: Specifies if a "wait" message should be displayed while the function is executing. Defaults to .t.

return.name: JSONData
return.description: Returns a JSON array of data showing the date for the form instances. Check the value of the *[xb:Obj.error]* parameter to determine whether or not the call was successful.

discussion.p: This function can be used to retrieve the data for a TransForm form. The result can be paginated so as not to return too much data at once.

If you request paginated data you must specify the page size and page number. For example, you might specify a page size of 10 and page number of 2. This will return 10 records, starting with the 11th record.

section.title: Example

description.p: Assume you have a form called "Pictures" and you want to retrieve the data for form

section.example: dim formId as c = "Pictures" dim apikey as c = "xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx" dim jsonData as c dim flagPaginated as l = .t. dim pageSize as n = 10 dim pageNumber as n = 1 dim pResult as p jsonData = a5TransForm_GetData(apikey, formid, flagPaginated, pageSize, pageNumber, pResult)

important.p: The A5TransForm_GetData() function is a convenient ways to use the TransForm API from Xbasic. It does not add any additional functionality to the API. You can use the API in your Xbasic code to achieve the same results.
